00018 #ifndef COBASE_RNG_H
00019 #define COBASE_RNG_H
00020 
00021 #include <co/base/debug.h> // for EQASSERT
00022 #include <co/base/init.h>  // friend functions
00023 #include <co/base/nonCopyable.h>
00024 
00025 #include <fcntl.h>
00026 #include <limits>
00027 #include <stdio.h>
00028 
00029 namespace co
00030 {
00031 namespace base
00032 {
00039     class RNG : public NonCopyable
00040     {
00041     public:
00043         RNG() { reseed(); }
00044 
00046         ~RNG() {}
00047 
00049         void reseed()
00050         {
00051 #ifdef Linux
00052             // NOP
00053 #elif defined (_WIN32)
00054             LARGE_INTEGER seed;
00055             QueryPerformanceCounter( &seed );
00056             srand( seed.LowPart );
00057 #else // Darwin
00058             srandomdev();
00059 #endif
00060         }
00061 
00070         template< typename T > T get()
00071         {
00072             T value;
00073 #ifdef Linux
00074             EQASSERTINFO( _fd >= 0, "init() not called?" );
00075             int read = ::read( _fd, &value, sizeof( T ));
00076             EQASSERTINFO( read == sizeof(T),
00077                           read << " != " << sizeof( T ) << ": " << sysError );
00078             if( read != sizeof( T ))
00079             {
00080                 EQERROR << "random number generator not working" << std::endl;
00081                 return 0;
00082             }
00083 
00084 #elif defined (_WIN32)
00085 
00086             EQASSERTINFO( RAND_MAX >= 32767, RAND_MAX );
00087 
00088             uint8_t* bytes = reinterpret_cast< uint8_t* >( &value );
00089             for( size_t i=0; i<sizeof( T ); ++i )
00090                 bytes[i] = ( rand() & 0xff );
00091 #else // Darwin
00092             uint8_t* bytes = reinterpret_cast< uint8_t* >( &value );
00093             for( size_t i=0; i<sizeof( T ); ++i )
00094                 bytes[i] = ( random() & 0xff );
00095 #endif
00096             return value;
00097         }
00098 
00099     private:
00100 #ifdef Linux
00101         static int _fd;
00102 #endif
00103         static bool _init();
00104         static bool _exit();
00105         friend COBASE_API bool init( const int argc, char** argv );
00106         friend COBASE_API bool exit();
00107     };
00108 
00109     template<> inline float RNG::get()
00110     {
00111         const float max_limits =
00112             static_cast< float >( std::numeric_limits< uint32_t >::max( ));
00113         return ( get< uint32_t >() / max_limits);
00114     }
00115     
00116     template<> inline double RNG::get()
00117     {
00118         const double max_limits =
00119             static_cast< double >( std::numeric_limits< uint64_t >::max( ));
00120         return ( get< uint64_t >() / max_limits);
00121     }
00122     
00123     template<> inline bool RNG::get()
00124     {
00125         return ( get< uint32_t >() & 1 );
00126     }
00127 }
00128 }
00129 #endif  // COBASE_RNG_H
